Economists call it The Great Resignation.
It started last April when the number of Americans who quit their jobs broke all records. This is not about a few people resigning here and there. Instead, … [+435 chars]

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: The world's insatiable appetite for electricity is setting up a climate disaster - CNN
articles.description: The world needs more electricity. That will mean severe climate damage, unless something changes soon.

articles.author: Michelle Toh, CNN Business
articles.title: India's richest man is pouring more than $80 billion into green energy - CNN
articles.description: Indian billionaire Mukesh Ambani is going big on green energy.
